Bridge config tag

Source: R/js-bridge.R
bridge_config_tag.Rd

Returns an htmltools::tags <script> element containing the JSON configuration for the shinymcp bridge. The element has id="shinymcp-config" and type="application/json" so the bridge JavaScript can read it on initialization.

Usage

bridge_config_tag(config)

Arguments

config

A list as returned by bridge_config(), or any named list that should be serialized as the bridge configuration.

Value

An htmltools::tags$script HTML tag.
